General.Name: Helix Acquisition Corp. II Class A Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Helix Acquisition Corp. II focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.
General.Address: 200 Clarendon Street, Boston, MA, United States, 02116
